data.condition: ($NeoTreeOutcome = 'DC' or $NeoTreeOutcome = 'TRH' or $NeoTreeOutcome = 'TRO') and ($DischHR < 100 or $DischHR > 160 or $DischSats < 92 or $DischRR < 40 or $DischRR > 60 or $DischTemp < 36.5 or $DischTemp > 37.5 or $DischWeight < 1600)
data.contentText:
The last vital signs you have entered are outside of the normal range!

Do the following and click the back button to cancel the script.

metadata.text3:
1) Weighs at least 1600g
2) Able to maintain normal temperatures for 3 days
2) Able to breast feed normally
3) Has gained 10-15mg/kg/day over past 3 days
metadata.title1: Reassess ABCD and resuscitate as necessary

data.title: RECONSIDER DISCHARGE
